processCheck.name: 服务 InceptorServer2 进程的 jinfo 检测 :
processCheck.command: jps -l | grep InceptorServer2 | cut -f 1 -d " " | xargs sudo -u hive /usr/java/latest/bin/jinfo

processCheck.name: 服务 InceptorServer2 进程的 jmap 前 20 行 :
processCheck.command: jps -l | grep InceptorServer2 | cut -f 1 -d " " | xargs sudo -u hive /usr/java/latest/bin/jmap -histo:live | head -n 23

processCheck.name: 服务 InceptorServer2 进程的 jstat gc :
processCheck.command: jps -l | grep InceptorServer2 | cut -f 1 -d " " | xargs sudo -u hive /usr/java/latest/bin/jstat -gc

processCheck.name: 服务 InceptorServer2 进程的 jstack NUMABLE :
processCheck.command: jps -l | grep InceptorServer2 | cut -f 1 -d " " | xargs sudo -u hive /usr/java/latest/bin/jstack | grep RUNNABLE | wc -l
